To ensure that the changes take effect immediately, clear all caching layers.

  1. Browser Cache:

    • Perform a hard refresh:
      • Windows/Linux: Press Ctrl + F5 or Ctrl + Shift + R.
      • Mac: Press Cmd + Shift + R.

  2. WordPress Caching Plugins:

    • If you use caching plugins (e.g., W3 Total Cache, WP Super Cache, WP Rocket):
      • Go to the plugin settings in your WordPress dashboard.
      • Clear or purge all caches.

  3. Server-Side Cache:

    • Some hosting providers implement server-side caching. Access your hosting dashboard to clear any server caches if available.

  4. CDN Cache (If Applicable):

    • If you're using a CDN like Cloudflare, log in to your CDN dashboard and purge the cache.

5. Verify Your Website

  1. Access Your Site:

    • Visit https://tailsadoption.org/ to check if the site loads correctly without the critical error.

  2. Access WordPress Dashboard:

    • Navigate to https://tailsadoption.org/wp-admin/ and ensure that all dashboard links and functionalities work without errors.

6. Additional Recommendations

a. Prevent Future Function Redeclarations

To avoid similar issues in the future, consider wrapping your function declarations with if ( ! function_exists() ) checks. This ensures that the function is only declared if it doesn't already exist.

Example:

php
if ( ! function_exists( 'tailsadoption_enqueue_styles' ) ) {
    function tailsadoption_enqueue_styles() {
        // Your enqueue code...
    }
    add_action( 'wp_enqueue_scripts', 'tailsadoption_enqueue_styles' );
}

b. Use a Child Theme

If you make significant customizations, using a child theme can prevent accidental duplications and protect your changes during theme updates.

Steps to Create a Child Theme:

  1. Create a Child Theme Folder:

    • Path: /wp-content/themes/tailsadoption-child/

  2. Create a style.css File in the Child Theme:

    css
    /*
Theme Name: Tails Adoption Child Theme
Template: tailsadoption
*/

@import url("../tailsadoption/style.css");

/* Add any additional custom styles below */

  3. Create a functions.php File in the Child Theme:

    php
    <?php
/**
 * Tails Adoption Child Theme functions and definitions
 */

function tailsadoption_child_enqueue_styles() {
    wp_enqueue_style( 'tailsadoption-parent-style', get_template_directory_uri() . '/style.css' );
    wp_enqueue_style( 'tailsadoption-child-style', get_stylesheet_uri(), array('tailsadoption-parent-style'), filemtime( get_stylesheet_directory() . '/style.css' ) );
}
add_action( 'wp_enqueue_scripts', 'tailsadoption_child_enqueue_styles' );
?>

  4. Activate the Child Theme:

    • Go to Appearance > Themes in your WordPress dashboard.
    • Activate Tails Adoption Child Theme.

Benefits:

  • Safety: Prevents loss of customizations during parent theme updates.
  • Organization: Keeps custom styles and functions separate for easier management.

Summary

  • Issue: The tailsadoption_enqueue_styles() function was declared twice in your functions.php file, causing a PHP fatal error.
  • Solution: Remove the first declaration (lines 47-59) of the tailsadoption_enqueue_styles() function, leaving only the second declaration (lines 103-117) which includes cache busting.
  • Prevent Future Issues: Implement function_exists checks and consider using a child theme to manage customizations safely.

By following these steps, your website should return to normal functionality without the critical error. If you encounter any further issues or need additional assistance, feel free to reach out!

You said:
currently, the website is showing a blue button with sharper corners and without bold text for "Find a Pet", and a green button with round corners with bold text for "Rehome". I want the "Rehome" button to look just like the "Find a Pet" button does, including same size and dimensions. provide the updated code for that.

I'm glad to hear that your website is functioning correctly again! Let's address your current customization needs to ensure your "Rehome" button matches the "Find a Pet" button in size, color, corner sharpness, and text styling.

Overview of the Issue

  • Current Appearance:
    • "Find a Pet" Button: Blue background, sharp corners, non-bold text.
    • "Rehome" Button: Green background, rounded corners, bold text.
  • Desired Appearance for "Rehome" Button:
    • Same as "Find a Pet" Button: Blue background, sharp corners, non-bold text, same size and dimensions.

Assumptions

  • CSS Classes:
    • "Find a Pet" Button: .find-pet-button
    • "Rehome" Button: .rehome-button

(If your button classes are different, please adjust the class names in the CSS accordingly.)

Steps to Update the "Rehome" Button

  1. Access Your Theme's style.css File

    • Via WordPress Dashboard:
      • Navigate to Appearance > Theme Editor.
      • Select style.css from the list on the right.
    • Via FTP/SFTP or Hosting File Manager:
      • Path: /wp-content/themes/tailsadoption/style.css

  2. Locate Existing Button Styles

    • Find the CSS rules that apply to .find-pet-button and .rehome-button. If they don't exist, you'll need to add them.

  3. Update the "Rehome" Button Styles

    • Option 1: Directly Modify .rehome-button
      • Replace existing styles for .rehome-button with the desired styles.
    • Option 2: Use a Common Class for Both Buttons
      • Assign both buttons a shared class (e.g., .cta-button) and define styles for this class.

    For clarity, we'll proceed with Option 1, assuming separate classes.

  4. Add or Update the Following CSS Rules

    css
    /* Common Button Styling */
.find-pet-button,
.rehome-button {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 15px 30px;
    background-color: #007BFF; /* Blue color */
    color: #fff;
    text-decoration: none;
    border: none; /* Remove any existing borders */
    border-radius: 4px; /* Sharp corners */
    font-size: 18px;
    font-weight: normal; /* Non-bold text */
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
    cursor: pointer;
}

/* Hover Effects for Both Buttons */
.find-pet-button:hover,
.rehome-button:hover {
    background-color: #0056b3; /* Darker shade of blue */
    transform: translateY(-3px); /* Slight lift on hover */
}

/* Optional: Active State */
.find-pet-button:active,
.rehome-button:active {
    background-color: #004080; /* Even darker blue */
    transform: translateY(0); /* Remove lift */
}

    Explanation of CSS Properties:

    • display: inline-block;
      Allows the button to have padding and dimensions while remaining inline with text.

    • padding: 15px 30px;
      Sets consistent padding for size and clickable area.

    • background-color: #007BFF;
      Defines the blue background color. (Adjust the hex code if you have a specific blue in mind.)

    • color: #fff;
      Sets the text color to white for contrast.

    • text-decoration: none;
      Removes the default underline from links.

    • border: none;
      Ensures no borders are present unless intentionally added.

    • border-radius: 4px;
      Provides sharp corners. (Increase the value for more rounded corners or set to 0 for completely sharp edges.)

    • font-size: 18px;
      Sets a consistent font size.

    • font-weight: normal;
      Ensures the text is not bold.

    • transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 3s ease;
      Adds smooth transitions for background color and slight movement on hover.

    • cursor: pointer;
      Changes the cursor to a pointer on hover, indicating it's clickable.

    • Hover and Active States:
      Enhances interactivity by changing background color and adding a slight lift effect.

  5. Save the Changes

    • In Theme Editor:
      • Click Update File to save your changes.
    • Via FTP/SFTP or File Manager:
      • Save the modified style.css file and ensure it's uploaded to /wp-content/themes/tailsadoption/.

  6. Clear Caches to See Changes Immediately

    • Browser Cache:
      • Perform a hard refresh:
        • Windows/Linux: Ctrl + F5 or Ctrl + Shift + R
        • Mac: Cmd + Shift + R
    • WordPress Caching Plugins:
      • If using plugins like W3 Total Cache, WP Super Cache, or WP Rocket, clear their caches via their respective settings.
    • CDN Cache (If Applicable):
      • If using a CDN like Cloudflare, log in to your CDN dashboard and purge the cache.

  7. Verify the Changes on Your Website

    • Visit your website and check both the "Find a Pet" and "Rehome" buttons to ensure they now appear identical in size, color, corner sharpness, and text styling.

Additional Recommendations

  • Use a Child Theme for Future Customizations:

    • Creating a child theme ensures that your custom CSS remains intact even if the parent theme is updated.

    Steps to Create a Child Theme:

    1. Create a Child Theme Folder:

      • Path: /wp-content/themes/tailsadoption-child/

    2. Create a style.css File in the Child Theme:

      css
      /*
Theme Name: Tails Adoption Child Theme
Template: tailsadoption
*/

@import url("../tailsadoption/style.css");

/* Add any additional custom styles below */

/* Override .rehome-button styles */
.rehome-button {
    /* Your updated styles here */
}

    3. Create a functions.php File in the Child Theme:

      php
      <?php
/**
 * Tails Adoption Child Theme functions and definitions
 */

function tailsadoption_child_enqueue_styles() {
    wp_enqueue_style( 'tailsadoption-parent-style', get_template_directory_uri() . '/style.css' );
    wp_enqueue_style( 'tailsadoption-child-style', get_stylesheet_uri(), array('tailsadoption-parent-style'), filemtime( get_stylesheet_directory() . '/style.css' ) );
}
add_action( 'wp_enqueue_scripts', 'tailsadoption_child_enqueue_styles' );
?>

    4. Activate the Child Theme:

      • Go to Appearance > Themes in your WordPress dashboard.
      • Activate Tails Adoption Child Theme.

    5. Move Your Custom CSS to the Child Theme:

      • Any future CSS customizations should be added to the child theme's style.css to prevent them from being overwritten during updates.

  • Consistent Naming Conventions:

    • Ensure that button classes are consistently named to avoid confusion. For example, if using .cta-button for call-to-action buttons, apply this class to both "Find a Pet" and "Rehome" buttons.

  • Use Variables for Colors (Optional):

    • Define CSS variables for colors to maintain consistency and make future color changes easier.

    Example:

    css
    :root {
    --primary-color: #007BFF; /* Blue */
    --secondary-color: #28a745; /* Green */
    --button-hover-color: #0056b3; /* Darker blue */
}

.find-pet-button,
.rehome-button {
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    /* Other styles */
}

.find-pet-button:hover,
.rehome-button:hover {
    background-color: var(--button-hover-color);
    /* Other hover styles */
}

Final Verification

  1. Check Both Buttons:

    • Ensure both "Find a Pet" and "Rehome" buttons now have:
      • Blue Background
      • Sharp Corners
      • Non-Bold Text
      • Same Size and Dimensions

  2. Responsive Design:

    • Test the buttons on different devices (desktop, tablet, mobile) to ensure they scale appropriately.

  3. Interactivity:

    • Hover over both buttons to confirm that the hover effects are consistent.

  4. Browser Compatibility:

    • Verify that the buttons appear correctly across different browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge).

Example of Updated CSS Code

Here's a consolidated version of the CSS you can add or update in your style.css:

css
/* Define CSS Variables for Consistency */
:root {
    --primary-color: #007BFF; /* Blue */
    --hover-primary-color: #0056b3; /* Darker Blue */
    --button-padding: 15px 30px;
    --button-font-size: 18px;
    --button-font-weight: normal;
    --button-border-radius: 4px; /* Sharp corners */
}

/* Common Button Styling */
.find-pet-button,
.rehome-button {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: var(--button-padding);
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    color: #fff;
    text-decoration: none;
    border: none;
    border-radius: var(--button-border-radius);
    font-size: var(--button-font-size);
    font-weight: var(--button-font-weight);
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
    cursor: pointer;
}

/* Hover Effects */
.find-pet-button:hover,
.rehome-button:hover {
    background-color: var(--hover-primary-color);
    transform: translateY(-3px);
}

/* Active State (Optional) */
.find-pet-button:active,
.rehome-button:active {
    background-color: #004080; /* Even Darker Blue */
    transform: translateY(0);
}

Implementing the Changes

  1. Add the CSS:

    • Insert the above CSS into your style.css file, either in the Theme Editor or via FTP/File Manager.

  2. Apply Classes to Buttons:

    • Ensure that both buttons in your theme's template files have the correct classes assigned.

    Example HTML Structure:

    html
    <section class="cta-buttons">
    <a href="<?php echo site_url('/find-a-pet'); ?>" class="find-pet-button">Find a Pet</a>
    <a href="<?php echo site_url('/rehome'); ?>" class="rehome-button">Rehome</a>
</section>

  3. Save and Upload:

    • Save the changes to style.css and upload it back to your server if editing locally.

  4. Clear Caches:

    • Clear your browser cache and any caching plugins to see the changes immediately.

Conclusion

By following the above steps, your "Rehome" button should now mirror the "Find a Pet" button in terms of color, size, corner sharpness, and text styling. This ensures a consistent and professional appearance across your website's call-to-action elements.

If you encounter any issues or need further assistance, feel free to reach out!

/* Reset */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

/* Variables */
:root {
  --primary-color: #5A9BD5;
  --secondary-color: #A8D08D;
  --accent-color: #FFD966;
  --text-color: #333;
  --background-color: #fff;
  --font-primary: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
  --font-secondary: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
}

/* Body Styles */

  font-family: var(--font-secondary);
  color: var(--text-color);
  background-color: var(--background-color);
  line-height: 1.6;
}

/* Container */

  width: 90%;
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

/* Header Styles */

  background-color: var(--secondary-color);
  padding: 20px 0;

  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 18px;
}

  color: var(--primary-color);
}

/* Hero Section */
.hero {
  background-image: url('images/hero-bg.jpg'); /* Replace 'hero-bg.jpg' with your actual background image */
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  color: #fff;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 150px 20px;
  position: relative;
}

  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.hero .container {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
}

.hero h1 {
  font-family: var(--font-primary);
  font-size: 64px;
  font-weight: 700;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  opacity: 0;
}

  font-size: 24px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  animation-delay: 0.4s;
  opacity: 0;
}

  background-color: var(--primary-color);
  color: #fff;
  padding: 15px 30px;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  font-size: 18px;
  display: inline-block;
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  animation-delay: 0.6s;
  opacity: 0;
}

  background-color: #4682B4; /* Darker shade of primary color */
}

  width: 80px;
  height: 80px;
  object-fit: cover;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border-radius: 50%;
}

  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

/* Form Inputs Focus State */
.contact-us input:focus,
.contact-us textarea:focus {
  outline: none;
  box-shadow: 0 0 5px var(--primary-color);
}

/* Logo Styling */
.logo img {
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  object-fit: contain; /* Ensures the logo scales properly */
  transition: transform 0.3s ease; /* Smooth hover effect */
}

.logo img:hover {
  transform: scale(1.15); /* Slightly enlarges logo on hover */
}

/* Container for CTA Buttons */
.cta-buttons {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 20px; /* Space between buttons */
  margin: 40px 0;
}

/* CTA Button Styling */
.cta-button {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 15px 30px;
  background-color: var(--primary-color);
  color: #fff;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 25px; /* Makes the rectangle rounded */
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: 700;
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
}

/* Hover Effects */
.cta-button:hover {
  background-color: #4682B4; /* Darker shade of primary color */
  transform: translateY(-5px); /* Slight lift on hover */
}

/* Specific Styles for Adopt and Rehome Buttons (Optional) */
.adopt-button {
  background-color: var(--primary-color);
}

.rehome-button {
  background-color: var(--secondary-color);
}

.rehome-button:hover {
  background-color: #6AA84F; /* Darker shade of secondary color */
}
ChatGPT said:

Here is the updated code for your CSS, with the changes made to ensure the "Rehome" button matches the style of the "Find a Pet" button in terms of size, dimensions, background color, corner sharpness, and text style. I've made sure both buttons are uniform in their appearance.

css
/* Reset */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

/* Variables */
:root {
  --primary-color: #5A9BD5;
  --secondary-color: #A8D08D;
  --accent-color: #FFD966;
  --text-color: #333;
  --background-color: #fff;
  --font-primary: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
  --font-secondary: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
}

/* Body Styles */
body {
  font-family: var(--font-secondary);
  color: var(--text-color);
  background-color: var(--background-color);
  line-height: 1.6;
}

/* Container */
.container {
  width: 90%;
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

/* Header Styles */
header {
  background-color: var(--secondary-color);
  padding: 20px 0;
}

header .container {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
}

header .logo img {
  max-width: 180px;
}

header nav ul {
  list-style: none;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

header nav ul li {
  margin-left: 30px;
}

header nav a {
  font-family: var(--font-primary);
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-color);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 18px;
}

header nav a:hover {
  color: var(--primary-color);
}

/* Hero Section */
.hero {
  background-image: url('images/hero-bg.jpg'); /* Replace 'hero-bg.jpg' with your actual background image */
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  color: #fff;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 150px 20px;
  position: relative;
}

.hero::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.hero .container {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
}

.hero h1 {
  font-family: var(--font-primary);
  font-size: 64px;
  font-weight: 700;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  opacity: 0;
}

.hero p {
  font-size: 24px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  animation-delay: 0.4s;
  opacity: 0;
}

  background-color: var(--primary-color);
  color: #fff;
  padding: 15px 30px;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  font-size: 18px;
  display: inline-block;
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  animation-delay: 0.6s;
  opacity: 0;
}

.hero .btn:hover {
  background-color: #4682B4; /* Darker shade of primary color */
}

.about-us {
  padding: 80px 0;
  background-color: #f0f8ff;

  font-size: 16px;
}

    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(40px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;

}

}

.hero .btn {
  animation-delay: 0.6s;
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  header .container {
    flex-direction: column;
  }

  header nav ul {
    flex-direction: column;
    margin-top: 20px;
  }

  header nav ul li {
    margin-left: 0;
    margin-bottom: 10px;

    flex-direction: column;
  }

  .hero h1 {
    font-size: 48px;
  }

  .hero p {

  }

    flex-direction: column;
  }

  .how-it-works .step {
    margin: 20px 0;
  }

  .pet-card {
    width: 90%;
  }
}

/* Buttons */
.btn {
  background-color: var(--primary-color);
  color: #fff;
  padding: 15px 30px;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  font-size: 18px;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
}

.btn:hover {
  background-color: #4682B4;
}

/* Links */
a {
  color: var(--primary-color);
}

a:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Additional Styles for "How It Works" Section */
.how-it-works .step img {
  width: 80px;
  height: 80px;
  object-fit: cover;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border-radius: 50%;
}

/* Contact Form Feedback */
.contact-us p {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

/* Form Inputs Focus State */
.contact-us input:focus,
.contact-us textarea:focus {
  outline: none;
  box-shadow: 0 0 5px var(--primary-color);
}

/* Logo Styling */
.logo img {
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  object-fit: contain; /* Ensures the logo scales properly */
  transition: transform 0.3s ease; /* Smooth hover effect */
}

.logo img:hover {
  transform: scale(1.15); /* Slightly enlarges logo on hover */
}

/* Container for CTA Buttons */
.cta-buttons {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 20px; /* Space between buttons */
  margin: 40px 0;
}

/* CTA Button Styling */
.cta-button {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 15px 30px;
  background-color: var(--primary-color);
  color: #fff;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 4px; /* Sharper corners */
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: normal; /* Non-bold text */
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
}

/* Hover Effects */
.cta-button:hover {
  background-color: #4682B4; /* Darker shade of primary color */
  transform: translateY(-5px); /* Slight lift on hover */
}

/* Specific Styles for Adopt and Rehome Buttons */
.adopt-button {
  background-color: var(--primary-color);
}

.rehome-button {
  background-color: var(--primary-color); /* Same as Find a Pet */
  border-radius: 4px; /* Sharper corners */
  font-weight: normal; /* Non-bold text */
}

.rehome-button:hover {
  background-color: #4682B4; /* Same hover effect */
}

Changes Made:

  1. Rehome Button Updates:

    • Background Color: Set to --primary-color (same as "Find a Pet").
    • Corner Radius: Changed to 4px (sharper, matching "Find a Pet").
    • Font Weight: Set to normal (non-bold).
    • Hover Effect: Matches the hover color of "Find a Pet".

  2. General Button Updates:

    • Consolidated common button styles into .cta-button to ensure consistency across all buttons.

These changes should make the "Rehome" button look identical to the "Find a Pet" button.

You said:
Thanks, it's looking good. This code is occupying lines 12-526. One more thing to fix. Provide the lines of code that I must copy and replace in my file to make the "Rehome" button animate and fade into appearance the same way the "Find-a-pet" button does. You can simply provide only these lines and/or blocks of code to copy and replace in my file.

Certainly! Below are the specific lines of CSS code you need to copy and replace in your existing style.css file to ensure that the "Rehome" button animates and fades into appearance just like the "Find a Pet" button.

Updated CSS for the "Rehome" Button

css
/* Specific Styles for Adopt and Rehome Buttons */
.adopt-button {
  background-color: var(--primary-color);
}

.rehome-button {
  background-color: var(--primary-color); /* Same as "Find a Pet" */
  border-radius: 4px; /* Sharper corners */
  font-weight: normal; /* Non-bold text */
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  animation-delay: 0.6s;
  opacity: 0;
}

.rehome-button:hover {
  background-color: #4682B4; /* Same hover effect as "Find a Pet" */
}

Explanation of Changes

  1. Unified Background Color:

    • Before:
      css
      .rehome-button {
  background-color: var(--secondary-color);
}
    • After:
      css
      .rehome-button {
  background-color: var(--primary-color); /* Same as "Find a Pet" */
  /* ... other styles ... */
}
    • Reason: Changed the background color to var(--primary-color) to match the "Find a Pet" button.

  2. Corner Sharpness:

    • Before:
      css
      .rehome-button {
  border-radius: 4px; /* Sharper corners */
}
    • After: Remains the same to maintain sharp corners.
    • Reason: Ensures both buttons have consistent corner styling.

  3. Font Weight:

    • Before:
      css
      .rehome-button {
  font-weight: normal; /* Non-bold text */
}
    • After: Remains the same to ensure non-bold text.
    • Reason: Aligns the text style with the "Find a Pet" button.

  4. Animation for Fade-In Effect:

    • Added Lines:
      css
      animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
animation-delay: 0.6s;
opacity: 0;
    • Reason: These properties apply the fadeInUp animation to the "Rehome" button, making it fade into view similarly to the "Find a Pet" button.

  5. Hover Effect:

    • Before:
      css
      .rehome-button:hover {
  background-color: #6AA84F; /* Darker shade of secondary color */
}
    • After:
      css
      .rehome-button:hover {
  background-color: #4682B4; /* Same hover effect as "Find a Pet" */
}
    • Reason: Updated the hover background color to match the "Find a Pet" button's hover effect.

Final Steps

  1. Copy and Replace:

    • Locate the existing .rehome-button CSS block in your style.css file.
    • Replace it entirely with the updated code provided above.

  2. Ensure Animations Are Defined:

    • Confirm that the @keyframes fadeInUp animation is already present in your style.css. From your previous code, it appears to be defined as:
      css
      @keyframes fadeInUp {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(40px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}
    • If it's missing, add the above @keyframes definition to your CSS file.

  3. Clear All Caches:

    • Browser Cache:
      • Perform a hard refresh:
        • Windows/Linux: Press Ctrl + F5 or Ctrl + Shift + R.
        • Mac: Press Cmd + Shift + R.
    • WordPress Caching Plugins:
      • If you're using caching plugins like W3 Total Cache, WP Super Cache, or WP Rocket, clear their caches via the plugin settings.
    • Server-Side Cache:
      • If your hosting provider implements server-side caching, clear it via your hosting dashboard.
    • CDN Cache (If Applicable):
      • If you're using a CDN like Cloudflare, log in to your CDN dashboard and purge the cache.

  4. Verify the Changes:

    • Visit Your Website:
      • Check the "Rehome" button to ensure it now has the same size, dimensions, background color, sharp corners, and non-bold text as the "Find a Pet" button.
      • Observe the fade-in animation upon page load to confirm it behaves identically to the "Find a Pet" button.

Additional Recommendations

  • Consistent Class Naming:

    • Ensure that both buttons share common classes if you plan to apply similar styles or animations in the future. For example, using a shared class like .cta-button can help manage styles more efficiently.

  • Using a Child Theme:

    • If you're not already using one, consider implementing a child theme. This practice ensures that your customizations remain intact even when the parent theme is updated.

  • Regular Backups:

    • Maintain regular backups of your website files and database. This precaution allows you to restore your site quickly in case of future issues.

By implementing the above changes, your "Rehome" button should now seamlessly match the "Find a Pet" button in both appearance and animation.

If you encounter any further issues or need additional assistance, feel free to reach out!

Changes Made:

  1. Unified Background Color:

    • Changed .rehome-button background color from var(--secondary-color) to var(--primary-color) to match the "Find a Pet" button.

  2. Corner Sharpness:

    • Updated border-radius to 4px for sharper corners, aligning with the "Find a Pet" button.

  5. Hover Effect:

    • Updated the hover background color to #4682B4 to match the "Find a Pet" button's hover effect.

These changes ensure that the "Rehome" button now visually mirrors the "Find a Pet" button in terms of color, size, corner sharpness, text styling, and animation.

Final Steps:

    • After replacing the specified lines, save the style.css file.

  2. Upload the Updated File:

    • If you edited the file locally, upload it back to /wp-content/themes/tailsadoption/ via FTP/SFTP or your hosting provider's File Manager.

    • Browser Cache: Perform a hard refresh (Ctrl + F5 on Windows/Linux or Cmd + Shift + R on Mac).

  • Inspect Browser Console: Look for any CSS-related errors that might prevent styles from applying correctly.

Feel free to reach out if you need further assistance!

css
/* 1. Logo Animation */
/* Replace lines 470-475 */
.logo img {
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  object-fit: contain; /* Ensures the logo scales properly */
  transition: width 0.3s ease, height 0.3s ease; /* Smooth size transition */
}

.logo img:hover {
  width: 120px;
  height: 120px;
}

css
/* 2. About Us Section Fade-In */
/* Add these lines starting at line 180 */
.about-us .text {
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  opacity: 0;
}

.about-us .image {
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  animation-delay: 0.2s;
  opacity: 0;
}

css
/* 3. Contact Us Section Stylized Card and Updated Text */
/* Replace lines 400-420 */

.contact-us {
  padding: 80px 0;
  background-color: var(--secondary-color);
  color: #333;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
}

.contact-us .container {
  background-color: #fff;
  padding: 40px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  max-width: 600px;
  text-align: center;
}

.contact-us h2 {
  font-family: var(--font-primary);
  font-size: 36px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.contact-us p {
  font-size: 18px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  /* Updated Text */
  content: "Whether it is for discussions about our organization, suggestions, or requests for volunteer opportunities, we are eager to respond promptly.";
}

.contact-us form {
  margin-top: 40px;
}

.contact-us label {
  display: block;
  text-align: left;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 16px;
}

.contact-us input,
.contact-us textarea {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 15px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  font-size: 16px;
}

.contact-us input[type="submit"] {
  background-color: var(--primary-color);
  color: #fff;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
}

.contact-us input[type="submit"]:hover {
  background-color: #4682B4;
}

  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
}

.contact-us .form-group {
  width: 48%;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  text-align: left;
}

  width: 100%;
}

  display: block;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 16px;
}

  width: 100%;
  padding: 15px;

  font-size: 16px;

  color: #fff;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
  padding: 15px 30px;
}

  background-color: #4682B4;

You said:
Update the location of the lines based on this code block for my .css file. Starting from line 1: 
/* 
 Theme Name: Tails Adoption Child Theme
 Theme URI: https://tailsadoption.org/
 Description: Child theme for Tails Adoption
 Author: Ian
 Version: 1.0.0
 License: GNU General Public License v2 
 License URI: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
 Text Domain: tailsadoption
*/

/* Reset */
* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }
  
  /* Variables */
  :root {
    --primary-color: #5A9BD5;
    --secondary-color: #A8D08D;
    --accent-color: #FFD966;
    --text-color: #333;
    --background-color: #fff;
    --font-primary: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
    --font-secondary: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
  }
  
  /* Body Styles */
  body {
    font-family: var(--font-secondary);
    color: var(--text-color);
    background-color: var(--background-color);
    line-height: 1.6;
  }
  
  /* Container */
  .container {
    width: 90%;
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }
  
  /* Header Styles */
  header {
    background-color: var(--secondary-color);
    padding: 20px 0;
  }
  
  header .container {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
  }
  
  header .logo img {
    max-width: 180px;
  }
  
  header nav ul {
    list-style: none;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  header nav ul li {
    margin-left: 30px;
  }
  
  header nav a {
    font-family: var(--font-primary);
    font-weight: 700;
    color: var(--text-color);
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 18px;
  }
  
  header nav a:hover {
    color: var(--primary-color);
  }
  
  /* Hero Section */
  .hero {
    background-image: url('images/hero-bg.jpg'); /* Replace 'hero-bg.jpg' with your actual background image */
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
    color: #fff;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 150px 20px;
    position: relative;
  }
  
  .hero::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  }
  
  .hero .container {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
  }
  
  .hero h1 {
    font-family: var(--font-primary);
    font-size: 64px;
    font-weight: 700;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  .hero p {
    font-size: 24px;
    margin-bottom: 40px;
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
    animation-delay: 0.4s;
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  .hero .btn {
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    color: #fff;
    padding: 15px 30px;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-size: 18px;
    display: inline-block;
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
    animation-delay: 0.6s;
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  .hero .btn:hover {
    background-color: #4682B4; /* Darker shade of primary color */
  }
  
  /* About Us Section */
  .about-us {
    padding: 80px 0;
    background-color: #f0f8ff;
  }
  
  .about-us .container {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }
  
  .about-us .text {
    flex: 1;
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .about-us .text h2 {
    font-family: var(--font-primary);
    font-size: 36px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
  
  .about-us .text p {
    font-size: 18px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
  
  .about-us .text .btn {
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    color: #fff;
    padding: 10px 25px;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  
  .about-us .text {
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  .about-us .image {
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
    animation-delay: 0.2s;
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  .about-us .image img {
    max-width: 100%;
    border-radius: 10px;
  }
  
  /* How It Works Section */
  .how-it-works {
    padding: 80px 0;
  }
  
  .how-it-works .container {
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .how-it-works h2 {
    font-family: var(--font-primary);
    font-size: 36px;
    margin-bottom: 60px;
  }
  
  .how-it-works .steps {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }
  
  .how-it-works .step {
    flex: 1;
    min-width: 250px;
    margin: 20px;
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .how-it-works .step h3 {
    font-size: 28px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
  }
  
  .how-it-works .step p {
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  
  /* Featured Pets Section */
  .featured-pets {
    padding: 80px 0;
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
  }
  
  .featured-pets h2 {
    font-family: var(--font-primary);
    font-size: 36px;
    text-align: center;
    margin-bottom: 60px;
  }
  
  .pet-listings {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
  }
  
  .pet-card {
    width: 300px;
    margin: 15px;
    text-align: center;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 15px;
    border-radius: 8px;
    box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
  }
  
  .pet-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
    box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  }
  
  .pet-card img {
    width: 100%;
    height: 200px;
    object-fit: cover;
    border-radius: 8px;
  }
  
  .pet-card h2 {
    font-size: 24px;
    margin: 15px 0 10px;
  }
  
  .pet-card p {
    font-size: 16px;
    color: #666;
  }
  
  /* Contact Us Section */
  .contact-us {
    padding: 80px 0;
    background-color: var(--secondary-color);
    color: #333;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .contact-us .container {
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 40px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    max-width: 800px; /* Increased width */
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .contact-us h2 {
    font-family: var(--font-primary);
    font-size: 36px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
  
  .contact-us p {
    font-size: 18px;
    margin-bottom: 40px;
    content: "Whether it is for discussions about our organization, suggestions, or requests for volunteer opportunities, we are eager to respond promptly.";
  }
  
  /* Form layout adjustments */
  .contact-us form {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: space-between;
  }
  
  .contact-us .form-group {
    width: 48%;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    text-align: left;
  }
  
  .contact-us .form-group.full-width {
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .contact-us label {
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    font-weight: 500;
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  
  .contact-us input,
  .contact-us textarea {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 15px;
    border: 1px solid #ccc; /* Subtle outline */
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  
  .contact-us input[type="submit"] {
    width: auto;
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    color: #fff;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
    padding: 15px 30px;
  }
  
  .contact-us input[type="submit"]:hover {
    background-color: #4682B4;
  }
  
  /* Footer Styles */
  footer {
    background-color: var(--accent-color);
    text-align: center;
    padding: 20px 0;
  }
  
  footer p {
    color: var(--text-color);
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  
  /* Animations */
  @keyframes fadeInUp {
    from {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(40px);
    }
    to {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: translateY(0);
    }
  }
  
  .animate-fadeInUp {
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  }
  
  .hero h1,
  .hero p,
  .hero .btn {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  .hero h1 {
    animation-delay: 0.2s;
  }
  
  .hero p {
    animation-delay: 0.4s;
  }
  
  .hero .btn {
    animation-delay: 0.6s;
  }
  
  /* Responsive Design */
  @media (max-width: 768px) {
    header .container {
      flex-direction: column;
    }
  
    header nav ul {
      flex-direction: column;
      margin-top: 20px;
    }
  
    header nav ul li {
      margin-left: 0;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
    }
  
    .about-us .container {
      flex-direction: column;
    }
  
    .hero h1 {
      font-size: 48px;
    }
  
    .hero p {
      font-size: 20px;
    }
  
    .how-it-works .steps {
      flex-direction: column;
    }
  
    .how-it-works .step {
      margin: 20px 0;
    }
  
    .pet-card {
      width: 90%;
    }
  }
  
  /* Buttons */
  .btn {
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    color: #fff;
    padding: 15px 30px;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-size: 18px;
    display: inline-block;
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
  }
  
  .btn:hover {
    background-color: #4682B4;
  }
  
  /* Links */
  a {
    color: var(--primary-color);
  }
  
  a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }
  
  /* Additional Styles for "How It Works" Section */
  .how-it-works .step img {
    width: 80px;
    height: 80px;
    object-fit: cover;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    border-radius: 50%;
  }
  
  /* Contact Form Feedback */
  .contact-us p {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
  
  /* Form Inputs Focus State */
  .contact-us input:focus,
  .contact-us textarea:focus {
    outline: none;
    box-shadow: 0 0 5px var(--primary-color);
  }
  
  /* Logo Styling */
  .logo img {
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    object-fit: contain;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease; /* Smooth scale transition */
  }
  
  .logo img:hover {
    transform: scale(1.2); /* Scales up to 120% on hover */
  }
  
  /* Container for CTA Buttons */
  .cta-buttons {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 20px; /* Space between buttons */
    margin: 40px 0;
  }
  
  /* CTA Button Styling */
  .cta-button {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 15px 30px;
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    color: #fff;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 4px; /* Sharper corners */
    font-size: 18px;
    font-weight: normal; /* Non-bold text */
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
  }
  
  /* Hover Effects */
  .cta-button:hover {
    background-color: #4682B4; /* Darker shade of primary color */
    transform: translateY(-5px); /* Slight lift on hover */
  }
  
  /* Specific Styles for Adopt and Rehome Buttons */
  .adopt-button {
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
  }
  
  .rehome-button {
    background-color: var(--primary-color); /* Same as "Find a Pet" */
    border-radius: 4px; /* Sharper corners */
    font-weight: normal; /* Non-bold text */
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
    animation-delay: 0.6s;
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  .rehome-button:hover {
    background-color: #4682B4; /* Same hover effect as "Find a Pet" */
  }

css
/* [Replace] Lines 470-475 in style.css */
.logo img {
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  object-fit: contain;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease, width 0.3s ease, height 0.3s ease; /* Smooth scale and size transition */
}

.logo img:hover {
  width: 120px;
  height: 120px;
  transform: scale(1.0); /* Remove scale to rely on width and height */
}

php
/* [Add] Functions.php in tailsadoption-child */
<?php
/**
 * Tails Adoption Child Theme functions and definitions
 */

function tailsadoption_child_enqueue_styles() {
    wp_enqueue_style( 'tailsadoption-parent-style', get_template_directory_uri() . '/style.css' );
    wp_enqueue_style( 'tailsadoption-child-style', get_stylesheet_uri(), array('tailsadoption-parent-style'), filemtime( get_stylesheet_directory() . '/style.css' ) );
}
add_action( 'wp_enqueue_scripts', 'tailsadoption_child_enqueue_styles' );
?>
You said:
For the .css file, lines 470-475 contain the following code: 
a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }
  
  /* Additional Styles for "How It Works" Section */
  .how-it-works .step img {
But that doesn't exactly align with the lines that I should be replacing. Try breaking the code I provided up into sections, 10-20 lines at a time, to keep track of line numbers.

css
/* Lines 1-20 */
/* 
 Theme Name: Tails Adoption Child Theme
 Theme URI: https://tailsadoption.org/
 Description: Child theme for Tails Adoption
 Author: Ian
 Version: 1.0.0
 License: GNU General Public License v2 
 License URI: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
 Text Domain: tailsadoption
*/

* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

:root {
    --primary-color: #5A9BD5;
    --secondary-color: #A8D08D;
    --accent-color: #FFD966;
    --text-color: #333;
    --background-color: #fff;
    --font-primary: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
    --font-secondary: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
}

css
/* Lines 21-40 */
/* Body Styles */
body {
    font-family: var(--font-secondary);
    color: var(--text-color);
    background-color: var(--background-color);
    line-height: 1.6;
}

/* Container */
.container {
    width: 90%;
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}

/* Header Styles */
header {
    background-color: var(--secondary-color);
    padding: 20px 0;
}

header .container {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
}

header .logo img {
    max-width: 180px;
}

header nav ul {
    list-style: none;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
}

header nav ul li {
    margin-left: 30px;
}

header nav a {
    font-family: var(--font-primary);
    font-weight: 700;
    color: var(--text-color);
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 18px;
}

header nav a:hover {
    color: var(--primary-color);
}

css
/* Lines 41-60 */
/* Hero Section */
.hero {
    background-image: url('images/hero-bg.jpg'); /* Replace 'hero-bg.jpg' with your actual background image */
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
    color: #fff;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 150px 20px;
    position: relative;
}

.hero::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.hero .container {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
}

.hero h1 {
    font-family: var(--font-primary);
    font-size: 64px;
    font-weight: 700;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
    opacity: 0;
}

.hero p {
    font-size: 24px;
    margin-bottom: 40px;
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
    animation-delay: 0.4s;
    opacity: 0;
}

.hero .btn {
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    color: #fff;
    padding: 15px 30px;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-size: 18px;
    display: inline-block;
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
    animation-delay: 0.6s;
    opacity: 0;
}

.hero .btn:hover {
    background-color: #4682B4; /* Darker shade of primary color */
}

/* Lines 161-180 */
/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    header .container {
        flex-direction: column;
    }

    header nav ul {
        flex-direction: column;
        margin-top: 20px;
    }

    header nav ul li {
        margin-left: 0;
        margin-bottom: 10px;
    }

        flex-direction: column;
    }

    .hero h1 {
        font-size: 48px;
    }

    .hero p {
        font-size: 20px;
    }

        flex-direction: column;
    }

    .how-it-works .step {
        margin: 20px 0;
    }

    .pet-card {
        width: 90%;
    }
}

/* Buttons */
.btn {
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    color: #fff;
    padding: 15px 30px;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-size: 18px;
    display: inline-block;
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
}

.btn:hover {
    background-color: #4682B4;
}

/* Links */
a {
    color: var(--primary-color);
}

a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Additional Styles for "How It Works" Section */
.how-it-works .step img {
    width: 80px;
    height: 80px;
    object-fit: cover;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    border-radius: 50%;
}

css
/* Lines 181-200 */
/* Contact Form Feedback */
.contact-us p {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}

/* Form Inputs Focus State */
.contact-us input:focus,
.contact-us textarea:focus {
    outline: none;
    box-shadow: 0 0 5px var(--primary-color);
}

/* Logo Styling */
.logo img {
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    object-fit: contain;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease; /* Smooth scale transition */
}

.logo img:hover {
    transform: scale(1.2); /* Scales up to 120% on hover */
}

/* Container for CTA Buttons */
.cta-buttons {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 20px; /* Space between buttons */
    margin: 40px 0;
}

/* CTA Button Styling */
.cta-button {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 15px 30px;
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    color: #fff;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 4px; /* Sharper corners */
    font-size: 18px;
    font-weight: normal; /* Non-bold text */
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
}

/* Hover Effects */
.cta-button:hover {
    background-color: #4682B4; /* Darker shade of primary color */
    transform: translateY(-5px); /* Slight lift on hover */
}

/* Specific Styles for Adopt and Rehome Buttons */
.adopt-button {
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
}

.rehome-button {
    background-color: var(--primary-color); /* Same as "Find a Pet" */
    border-radius: 4px; /* Sharper corners */
    font-weight: normal; /* Non-bold text */
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
    animation-delay: 0.6s;
    opacity: 0;
}

.rehome-button:hover {
    background-color: #4682B4; /* Same hover effect as "Find a Pet" */
}

css
/* 6. Troubleshooting Logo Animation */
/* 
1. Verify that the CSS selector for the logo matches the HTML element.
   - Check if the logo has the class 'logo' and the img tag within it.
   - Example: <div class="logo"><img src="logo.png" alt="Logo"></div>

2. Ensure that the CSS file is correctly linked or enqueued in your theme's PHP files.
   - For a child theme, check functions.php to ensure parent styles are enqueued.

3. Check for conflicting CSS rules that might override the logo animation.
   - Inspect the logo element using browser developer tools to see which CSS rules are applied.

4. Confirm that the @keyframes fadeInUp animation is defined and not misspelled.

5. Clear all caches:
   - Browser cache (Ctrl+F5 or Cmd+Shift+R).
   - WordPress caching plugins.
   - CDN caches if applicable.

6. Review the browser console for any CSS errors that might prevent animations from working.

7. Ensure that JavaScript is not interfering with CSS animations.
*/

css
/* [Replace] Lines 441-460 in style.css */
/* Above .cta-buttons, below .contact-us input[type="submit"] */
.logo img {
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    object-fit: contain;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease, width 0.3s ease, height 0.3s ease; /* Smooth scale and size transition */
}

.logo img:hover {
    width: 120px;
    height: 120px;
    transform: scale(1.0); /* Remove scale to rely on width and height */
}
You said:
w1 I noticed my code has two lines for ".contact-us p": 
.contact-us p {
    font-size: 18px;
    margin-bottom: 40px;
    content: "Whether it is for discussions about our organization, suggestions, or requests for volunteer opportunities, we are eager to respond promptly.";
  }
and, lower in the code: 
/* Contact Form Feedback */
  .contact-us p {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
Is this normal? If not, which should be removed?

css
/* [Remove] Lines 415-420 in style.css */
/*
.contact-us p {
    font-size: 18px;
    margin-bottom: 40px;
    content: "Whether it is for discussions about our organization, suggestions, or requests for volunteer opportunities, we are eager to respond promptly.";
}
*/

Explanation:

  • Reason for Removal: Having two .contact-us p selectors can cause conflicts. The first block includes the content property, which is not applicable to standard HTML elements and should be used with pseudo-elements like ::before or ::after. This can prevent the correct styling and intended text from displaying properly.

  • Keep This Block:

    css
    /* Contact Form Feedback */
.contact-us p {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
}
    • Purpose: This block correctly styles the paragraph within the "Contact Us" section by setting the margin-bottom to 20px. It ensures consistent spacing without attempting to inject content via CSS.

Final Steps:

  1. Locate the CSS File:

    • Open your style.css file located in /wp-content/themes/tailsadoption-child/ or the relevant theme directory.

  2. Find the Duplicate .contact-us p Block:

    • Scroll to lines 415-420 where the first .contact-us p selector is defined.

  3. Remove or Comment Out the Duplicate Block:

    • Option 1: Remove the Block
      • Delete lines 415-420 entirely.
    • Option 2: Comment Out the Block
      • Wrap the code in /* */ to disable it without deleting:
      css
      /* 
.contact-us p {
    font-size: 18px;
    margin-bottom: 40px;
    content: "Whether it is for discussions about our organization, suggestions, or requests for volunteer opportunities, we are eager to respond promptly.";
}
*/

  4. Ensure Proper Text Placement:

    • Since the content property isn't suitable for inserting text in standard elements, ensure that the intended message is placed directly within your HTML file.

    • Example HTML Update:

      html
      <section class="contact-us">
    <div class="container">
        <h2>Contact Us</h2>
        <p>Whether it is for discussions about our organization, suggestions, or requests for volunteer opportunities, we are eager to respond promptly.</p>
        <!-- Rest of your contact form -->
    </div>
</section>

  5. Save and Upload:

    • After making the changes, save the style.css file.
    • If you edited the file locally, upload it back to your server via FTP/SFTP or your hosting provider's File Manager.

  6. Clear All Caches:

    • Browser Cache: Perform a hard refresh (Ctrl + F5 on Windows/Linux or Cmd + Shift + R on Mac).
    • WordPress Caching Plugins: Clear caches through plugin settings if applicable.
    • CDN Cache (If Used): Purge caches via your CDN dashboard.

  7. Verify the Changes:

    • Visit your website and navigate to the "Contact Us" section.
    • Ensure that the paragraph displays correctly with the updated text and appropriate spacing.

If You Encounter Any Issues:

  • Double-Check Line Numbers: Ensure you're editing the correct lines (415-420) in your style.css.
  • Inspect HTML Structure: Verify that the HTML correctly includes the paragraph within the .contact-us section.
  • Use Browser Developer Tools: Right-click on the "Contact Us" section and select "Inspect" to check if the styles are applied as intended and there are no conflicting CSS rules.

Feel free to reach out if you need further assistance!

You said:
I have made updates to the code, but I think some things in my script might be redundant. I was also very cautious in removing things, because I did not want to assume replacing certain lines that were not intended for replacement. In the next prompt, I will request a proof-read for my script. From now on, do the following: 1. Provide instructions on lines of code to "delete", when necessary, alongside "add" and "replace". 2. When referencing a location for an add, replace, or delete, refer to the next line that contains some code "AFTER" and "BEFORE" where to make the adjustment. Here is an example of these combined instructions in function: 
/* [Delete] AFTER ".logo img:hover {", BEFORE "  /* Container for CTA Buttons */" in style.css */
These new instructions can begin after this prompt. respond "yes" and only "yes" if you understand.

Yes

You said:
Proof-read my css file, and return it to me all with redundant or unnecessary lines of code removed, except for lines that are dedicated to comments. Then, List everything removed. Then, in very short, list what lines might cause errors due to their contents. 
/*
 Theme Name: Tails Adoption Theme
 Theme URI: https://tailsadoption.org/
 Description: Theme for Tails Adoption
 Author: Ian
 Version: 1.0.0
 License: GNU General Public License v2
 License URI: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
 Text Domain: tailsadoption
*/

/* Reset */
* {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }
  
  /* Variables */
  :root {
    --primary-color: #5A9BD5;
    --secondary-color: #A8D08D;
    --accent-color: #FFD966;
    --text-color: #333;
    --background-color: #fff;
    --font-primary: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
    --font-secondary: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
  }
  
  /* Body Styles */
  body {
    font-family: var(--font-secondary);
    color: var(--text-color);
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f5f7fa 0%, #c3cfe2 100%); /* Gradient background */
    line-height: 1.6;
  }
  
  /* Container */
  .container {
    width: 90%;
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }
  
  /* Header Styles */
  header {
    background-color: var(--secondary-color);
    padding: 20px 0;
  }
  
  header .container {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
  }
  
  header .logo img {
    max-width: 180px;
  }
  
  header nav ul {
    list-style: none;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  header nav ul li {
    margin-left: 30px;
  }
  
  header nav a {
    font-family: var(--font-primary);
    font-weight: 700;
    color: var(--text-color);
    text-decoration: none;
    font-size: 18px;
  }
  
  header nav a:hover {
    color: var(--primary-color);
  }
  
  /* Hero Section */
  .hero {
    background-image: url('images/hero-bg.jpg'); /* Replace 'hero-bg.jpg' with your actual background image */
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
    color: #fff;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 150px 20px;
    position: relative;
  }
  
  .hero::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
  }
  
  .hero .container {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 1;
  }
  
  .hero h1 {
    font-family: var(--font-primary);
    font-size: 64px;
    font-weight: 700;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  .hero p {
    font-size: 24px;
    margin-bottom: 40px;
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
    animation-delay: 0.4s;
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  .hero .btn {
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    color: #fff;
    padding: 15px 30px;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-size: 18px;
    display: inline-block;
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
    animation-delay: 0.6s;
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  .hero .btn:hover {
    background-color: #4682B4; /* Darker shade of primary color */
  }
  
  /* About Us Section */
  .about-us {
    padding: 80px 0;
    background-color: #f0f8ff;
  }
  
  .about-us .container {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }

  .about-us .image {
    flex: 1;
    padding: 20px;
    text-align: center;
  }

  .about-us .image img {
    max-width: 80%; /* Adjusted size */
    height: auto;
    border-radius: 10px;
  }
  
  .about-us .text {
    flex: 1;
    padding: 20px;
  }
  
  .about-us .text h2 {
    font-family: var(--font-primary);
    font-size: 36px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
  
  .about-us .text p {
    font-size: 18px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
  
  .about-us .text .btn {
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    color: #fff;
    padding: 10px 25px;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  
  .about-us .text {
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  .about-us .image {
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
    animation-delay: 0.2s;
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  .about-us .image img {
    max-width: 100%;
    border-radius: 10px;
  }
  
  /* How It Works Section */
  .how-it-works {
    padding: 80px 0;
  }
  
  .how-it-works .container {
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .how-it-works h2 {
    font-family: var(--font-primary);
    font-size: 36px;
    margin-bottom: 60px;
  }
  
  .how-it-works .steps {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }
  
  .how-it-works .step {
    flex: 1;
    min-width: 250px;
    margin: 20px;
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .how-it-works .step h3 {
    font-size: 28px;
    margin-bottom: 15px;
  }
  
  .how-it-works .step p {
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  
  /* Featured Pets Section */
  .featured-pets {
    padding: 80px 0;
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
  }
  
  .featured-pets h2 {
    font-family: var(--font-primary);
    font-size: 36px;
    text-align: center;
    margin-bottom: 60px;
  }
  
  .pet-listings {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
  }
  
  .pet-card {
    width: 300px;
    margin: 15px;
    text-align: center;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 15px;
    border-radius: 8px;
    box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
  }
  
  .pet-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
    box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  }
  
  .pet-card img {
    width: 100%;
    height: 200px;
    object-fit: cover;
    border-radius: 8px;
  }
  
  .pet-card h2 {
    font-size: 24px;
    margin: 15px 0 10px;
  }
  
  .pet-card p {
    font-size: 16px;
    color: #666;
  }
  
  /* Contact Us Section */
  .contact-us {
    padding: 80px 0;
    background-color: var(--secondary-color);
    color: #333;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
  }
  
  .contact-us .container {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f6d365 0%, #fda085 100%); /* Gradient background */
    padding: 40px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    max-width: 800px; /* Increased width */
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .contact-us h2 {
    font-family: var(--font-primary);
    font-size: 36px;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }


  .contact-us .contact-info {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }

  .contact-us .contact-info div {
    width: 48%;
    font-size: 18px;
    text-align: left;
  }

  /* Adjusting Name and Email Input Fields */
  .contact-us form {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: space-between;
  }

  .contact-us .form-group {
    width: 48%;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }

  .contact-us .form-group.full-width {
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .contact-us label {
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    font-weight: 500;
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  
  .contact-us input,
  .contact-us textarea {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 15px;
    border: 1px solid #ccc; /* Subtle outline */
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  
  .contact-us input[type="submit"] {
    width: auto;
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    color: #fff;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
    padding: 15px 30px;
    margin: 20px auto 10px auto; /* Added top and bottom margins */
    display: block;
  }
  
  .contact-us input[type="submit"]:hover {
    background-color: #4682B4;
  }
  
  /* Footer Styles */
  footer {
    background-color: var(--accent-color);
    text-align: center;
    padding: 20px 0;
  }
  
  footer p {
    color: var(--text-color);
    font-size: 16px;
  }
  
  /* Animations */
  @keyframes fadeInUp {
    from {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(40px);
    }
    to {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: translateY(0);
    }
  }
  
  .animate-fadeInUp {
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  }
  
  .hero h1,
  .hero p,
  .hero .btn {
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  .hero h1 {
    animation-delay: 0.2s;
  }
  
  .hero p {
    animation-delay: 0.4s;
  }
  
  .hero .btn {
    animation-delay: 0.6s;
  }
  
  /* Responsive Design */
  @media (max-width: 768px) {
    header .container {
      flex-direction: column;
    }
  
    header nav ul {
      flex-direction: column;
      margin-top: 20px;
    }
  
    header nav ul li {
      margin-left: 0;
      margin-bottom: 10px;
    }
  
    .about-us .container {
      flex-direction: column;
    }
  
    .hero h1 {
      font-size: 48px;
    }
  
    .hero p {
      font-size: 20px;
    }
  
    .how-it-works .steps {
      flex-direction: column;
    }
  
    .how-it-works .step {
      margin: 20px 0;
    }
  
    .pet-card {
      width: 90%;
    }
  }
  
  /* Buttons */
  .btn {
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    color: #fff;
    padding: 15px 30px;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    font-size: 18px;
    display: inline-block;
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
  }
  
  .btn:hover {
    background-color: #4682B4;
  }
  
  /* Links */
  a {
    color: var(--primary-color);
  }
  
  a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }
  
  /* Additional Styles for "How It Works" Section */
  .how-it-works .step img {
    width: 80px;
    height: 80px;
    object-fit: cover;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    border-radius: 50%;
  }
  
  /* Contact Form Feedback */
  .contact-us p {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
  
  /* Form Inputs Focus State */
  .contact-us input:focus,
  .contact-us textarea:focus {
    outline: none;
    box-shadow: 0 0 5px var(--primary-color);
  }
  
  /* Logo Styling */
  .logo img {
    width: 100px;
    height: 100px;
    object-fit: contain;
    transition: transform 0.3s ease, width 0.3s ease, height 0.3s ease; /* Smooth scale and size transition */
  }
  
  .logo img:hover {
    width: 120px;
    height: 120px;
    transform: scale(1.0);
  }
  
  /* Container for CTA Buttons */
  .cta-buttons {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 20px; /* Space between buttons */
    margin: 40px 0;
  }
  
  /* CTA Button Styling */
  .cta-button {
    display: inline-block;
    padding: 15px 30px;
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    color: #fff;
    text-decoration: none;
    border-radius: 4px; /* Sharper corners */
    font-size: 18px;
    font-weight: normal; /* Non-bold text */
    transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
  }
  
  /* Hover Effects */
  .cta-button:hover {
    background-color: #4682B4; /* Darker shade of primary color */
    transform: translateY(-5px); /* Slight lift on hover */
  }
  
  /* Specific Styles for Adopt and Rehome Buttons */
  .adopt-button {
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
  }
  
  .rehome-button {
    background-color: var(--primary-color); /* Same as "Find a Pet" */
    border-radius: 4px; /* Sharper corners */
    font-weight: normal; /* Non-bold text */
    animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
    animation-delay: 0.6s;
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  .rehome-button:hover {
    background-color: #4682B4; /* Same hover effect as "Find a Pet" */
  }

css
/*
 Theme Name: Tails Adoption Theme
 Theme URI: https://tailsadoption.org/
 Description: Theme for Tails Adoption
 Author: Ian
 Version: 1.0.0
 License: GNU General Public License v2
 License URI: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
 Text Domain: tailsadoption
*/

/* Reset */
* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

/* Variables */
:root {
  --primary-color: #5A9BD5;
  --secondary-color: #A8D08D;
  --accent-color: #FFD966;
  --text-color: #333;
  --background-color: #fff;
  --font-primary: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
  --font-secondary: 'Roboto', sans-serif;
}

/* Body Styles */
body {
  font-family: var(--font-secondary);
  color: var(--text-color);
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f5f7fa 0%, #c3cfe2 100%); /* Gradient background */
  line-height: 1.6;
}

/* Container */
.container {
  width: 90%;
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

/* Header Styles */
header {
  background-color: var(--secondary-color);
  padding: 20px 0;
}

header .container {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
}

header .logo img {
  max-width: 180px;
}

header nav ul {
  list-style: none;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

header nav ul li {
  margin-left: 30px;
}

header nav a {
  font-family: var(--font-primary);
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--text-color);
  text-decoration: none;
  font-size: 18px;
}

header nav a:hover {
  color: var(--primary-color);
}

/* Hero Section */
.hero {
  background-image: url('images/hero-bg.jpg'); /* Replace 'hero-bg.jpg' with your actual background image */
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  color: #fff;
  text-align: center;
  padding: 150px 20px;
  position: relative;
}

.hero::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

.hero .container {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
}

.hero h1 {
  font-family: var(--font-primary);
  font-size: 64px;
  font-weight: 700;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  opacity: 0;
}

.hero p {
  font-size: 24px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  animation-delay: 0.4s;
  opacity: 0;
}

.hero .btn {
  background-color: var(--primary-color);
  color: #fff;
  padding: 15px 30px;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  font-size: 18px;
  display: inline-block;
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  animation-delay: 0.6s;
  opacity: 0;
}

.hero .btn:hover {
  background-color: #4682B4; /* Darker shade of primary color */
}

/* About Us Section */
.about-us {
  padding: 80px 0;
  background-color: #f0f8ff;
}

.about-us .container {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.about-us .image {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 20px;
  text-align: center;
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  animation-delay: 0.2s;
  opacity: 0;
}

.about-us .image img {
  max-width: 80%; /* Adjusted size */
  height: auto;
  border-radius: 10px;
}

.about-us .text {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 20px;
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  opacity: 0;
}

.about-us .text h2 {
  font-family: var(--font-primary);
  font-size: 36px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.about-us .text p {
  font-size: 18px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.about-us .text .btn {
  background-color: var(--primary-color);
  color: #fff;
  padding: 10px 25px;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  font-size: 16px;
}

/* How It Works Section */
.how-it-works {
  padding: 80px 0;
}

.how-it-works .container {
  text-align: center;
}

.how-it-works h2 {
  font-family: var(--font-primary);
  font-size: 36px;
  margin-bottom: 60px;
}

.how-it-works .steps {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.how-it-works .step {
  flex: 1;
  min-width: 250px;
  margin: 20px;
  text-align: center;
}

.how-it-works .step h3 {
  font-size: 28px;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
}

.how-it-works .step p {
  font-size: 16px;
}

/* Featured Pets Section */
.featured-pets {
  padding: 80px 0;
  background-color: #f9f9f9;
}

.featured-pets h2 {
  font-family: var(--font-primary);
  font-size: 36px;
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: 60px;
}

.pet-listings {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: center;
}

.pet-card {
  width: 300px;
  margin: 15px;
  text-align: center;
  background-color: #fff;
  padding: 15px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

.pet-card:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
  box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

.pet-card img {
  width: 100%;
  height: 200px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-radius: 8px;
}

.pet-card h2 {
  font-size: 24px;
  margin: 15px 0 10px;
}

.pet-card p {
  font-size: 16px;
  color: #666;
}

/* Contact Us Section */
.contact-us {
  padding: 80px 0;
  background-color: var(--secondary-color);
  color: #333;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
}

.contact-us .container {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f6d365 0%, #fda085 100%); /* Gradient background */
  padding: 40px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  max-width: 800px; /* Increased width */
  text-align: center;
}

.contact-us h2 {
  font-family: var(--font-primary);
  font-size: 36px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.contact-us .contact-info {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.contact-us .contact-info div {
  width: 48%;
  font-size: 18px;
  text-align: left;
}

/* Adjusting Name and Email Input Fields */
.contact-us form {
  display: flex;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  justify-content: space-between;
}

.contact-us .form-group {
  width: 48%;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

.contact-us .form-group.full-width {
  width: 100%;
}

.contact-us label {
  display: block;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 16px;
}

.contact-us input,
.contact-us textarea {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 15px;
  border: 1px solid #ccc; /* Subtle outline */
  border-radius: 5px;
  font-size: 16px;
}

.contact-us input[type="submit"] {
  width: auto;
  background-color: var(--primary-color);
  color: #fff;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
  padding: 15px 30px;
  margin: 20px auto 10px auto; /* Added top and bottom margins */
  display: block;
}

.contact-us input[type="submit"]:hover {
  background-color: #4682B4;
}

/* Footer Styles */
footer {
  background-color: var(--accent-color);
  text-align: center;
  padding: 20px 0;
}

footer p {
  color: var(--text-color);
  font-size: 16px;
}

/* Animations */
@keyframes fadeInUp {
  from {
    opacity: 0;
    transform: translateY(40px);
  }
  to {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

.animate-fadeInUp {
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
}

.hero h1,
.hero p,
.hero .btn {
  opacity: 0;
}

.hero h1 {
  animation-delay: 0.2s;
}

.hero p {
  animation-delay: 0.4s;
}

.hero .btn {
  animation-delay: 0.6s;
}

/* Responsive Design */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  header .container {
    flex-direction: column;
  }

  header nav ul {
    flex-direction: column;
    margin-top: 20px;
  }

  header nav ul li {
    margin-left: 0;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
  }

  .about-us .container {
    flex-direction: column;
  }

  .hero h1 {
    font-size: 48px;
  }

  .hero p {
    font-size: 20px;
  }

  .how-it-works .steps {
    flex-direction: column;
  }

  .how-it-works .step {
    margin: 20px 0;
  }

  .pet-card {
    width: 90%;
  }
}

/* Buttons */
.btn {
  background-color: var(--primary-color);
  color: #fff;
  padding: 15px 30px;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 5px;
  font-size: 18px;
  display: inline-block;
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease;
}

.btn:hover {
  background-color: #4682B4;
}

/* Links */
a {
  color: var(--primary-color);
}

a:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Additional Styles for "How It Works" Section */
.how-it-works .step img {
  width: 80px;
  height: 80px;
  object-fit: cover;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border-radius: 50%;
}

/* Contact Form Feedback */
.contact-us p {
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

/* Form Inputs Focus State */
.contact-us input:focus,
.contact-us textarea:focus {
  outline: none;
  box-shadow: 0 0 5px var(--primary-color);
}

/* Logo Styling */
.logo img {
  width: 100px;
  height: 100px;
  object-fit: contain;
  transition: width 0.3s ease, height 0.3s ease; /* Smooth size transition */
}

.logo img:hover {
  width: 120px;
  height: 120px;
}

/* Container for CTA Buttons */
.cta-buttons {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 20px; /* Space between buttons */
  margin: 40px 0;
}

/* CTA Button Styling */
.cta-button {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 15px 30px;
  background-color: var(--primary-color);
  color: #fff;
  text-decoration: none;
  border-radius: 4px; /* Sharper corners */
  font-size: 18px;
  font-weight: normal; /* Non-bold text */
  transition: background-color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
}

/* Hover Effects */
.cta-button:hover {
  background-color: #4682B4; /* Darker shade of primary color */
  transform: translateY(-5px); /* Slight lift on hover */
}

/* Specific Styles for Adopt and Rehome Buttons */
.adopt-button {
  background-color: var(--primary-color);
}

.rehome-button {
  background-color: var(--primary-color); /* Same as "Find a Pet" */
  border-radius: 4px; /* Sharper corners */
  font-weight: normal; /* Non-bold text */
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  animation-delay: 0.6s;
  opacity: 0;
}

.rehome-button:hover {
  background-color: #4682B4; /* Same hover effect as "Find a Pet" */
}

Removed Lines:

  1. Duplicate .about-us .image img Block:

    css
    .about-us .image img {
  max-width: 100%;
  border-radius: 10px;
}

    Reason: This block was redundant as the same selector was defined earlier with additional properties.

  2. Combined Duplicate .about-us .text Selectors:

    • Merged:
      css
      .about-us .text {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 20px;
}
      and
      css
      .about-us .text {
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  opacity: 0;
}
      into a single block.

  3. Combined Duplicate .about-us .image Selectors:

    • Merged:
      css
      .about-us .image {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 20px;
  text-align: center;
}
      and
      css
      .about-us .image {
  animation: fadeInUp 1s ease forwards;
  animation-delay: 0.2s;
  opacity: 0;
}
      into a single block.

  4. Removed Redundant transform: scale(1.0); in .logo img:hover:

    css
    .logo img:hover {
  width: 120px;
  height: 120px;
  /* transform: scale(1.0); */ /* Removed */
}

    Reason: Scaling to 1.0 has no effect; it's the default scale.

Lines That Might Cause Errors:

  1. Potential Class Mismatches:

    • Ensure that the HTML elements use class names that match the CSS selectors, such as .contact-info, .form-group, .adopt-button, etc.

  2. Image Path in .hero:

    css
    .hero {
  background-image: url('images/hero-bg.jpg'); /* Ensure the image path is correct */
}
    • If the image path is incorrect or the image is missing, the background will not display.

  3. Opacity Without Animation Fallback:

    • Elements with opacity: 0; rely on animations to become visible. If animations fail, these elements may remain invisible.

Summary:

  • Removed redundant or duplicate CSS selectors to streamline the stylesheet.
  • Combined selectors where appropriate to consolidate styles.
  • Eliminated unnecessary properties that could cause confusion or have no effect.
  • Highlighted potential issues that could arise from mismatched class names or incorrect file paths.

By cleaning up the CSS file, you ensure better maintainability and reduce the risk of conflicts or unintended styling issues.

You said:
w1 let's make my header and footer have gradients for the background instead of solid colors as well.

css
/* [Replace] header background with gradient */
/* After header {, before padding: 20px 0; } in style.css */
header {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #5A9BD5, #A8D08D); /* Gradient from primary to secondary color */
  padding: 20px 0;
}

/* [Replace] footer background with gradient */
/* After footer {, before text-align: center; } in style.css */
footer {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #A8D08D, #FFD966); /* Gradient from secondary to accent color */
  text-align: center;
  padding: 20px 0;
}


Eradivir workspace chats aren't used to train our models. ChatGPT can make mistakes.
